10000001-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000002-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000003-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000004-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000005-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000006-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000007-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000008-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000009-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000010-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000011-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000012-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000013-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000014-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000015-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000016-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000017-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000018-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000019-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000020-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10000021-NaColorSystem-null.name: One of 20 basic colors designated by the Tria Fashion Society. They cover all the most popular colors, making it easy for beginners to mix and match.

10001000-NaColorSystem-null.name: The undercoat of a $npcName:23000019$ is comprised of soft, thick feathers in this hue. Those feathers are often used for jewelry and ornaments, which gives this color a more elegant reputation.

10001001-NaColorSystem-null.name: Brokers of the underworld don suits in this shade when they want to appear more respectable.

10001002-NaColorSystem-null.name: You can almost smell the rich fragrances of soil and wood in this color.

10001003-NaColorSystem-null.name: When you're living on the run, you do what it takes to survive. Even if that's eating the world's worst fruit.

10001004-NaColorSystem-null.name: Defenders of the light dress in bold colors like this rich blue to show their foes their spirit.

10001005-NaColorSystem-null.name: Eyes of this deepest blue often hold profound truths.

10001006-NaColorSystem-null.name: This rich violet is a color only found in the dark corners of the world.

10001007-NaColorSystem-null.name: Lighter varieties of $item:20000004$ come in this color, making it the perfect pick-me-up!

10001008-NaColorSystem-null.name: The stinging storms of $map:02000051$ inspired this earthy tone.

10001009-NaColorSystem-null.name: The polished palace floors of $map:02000001$ share this stately hue.

10001010-NaColorSystem-null.name: The color of a plump, juicy peach that's been dropped on its bottom.

10001011-NaColorSystem-null.name: This somber color evokes a sense of loneliness unbefitting its namesake.

10001012-NaColorSystem-null.name: The mages of Ellinel Magic Academy highlight their uniforms with this understated green.

10001013-NaColorSystem-null.name: Only one with a pronounced appreciation for subtlety could pull off this soft, bright green.

10001014-NaColorSystem-null.name: A lot of green and a hint of blue make this the Heavy Gunner's favorite color!

10001015-NaColorSystem-null.name: The Royal Knights use bright tones like this sky blue to keep their spirits high.

10001016-NaColorSystem-null.name: $npcName:11000255$'s look is always perfectly assembled, and she usually goes with this shade of eye shadow.

10001017-NaColorSystem-null.name: A delicate shade of pink for the aesthetically inclined.

10001018-NaColorSystem-null.name: This gallant hue is reserved for formal dress uniforms.

10001019-NaColorSystem-null.name: Colors like this inspire adventurers to seek new horizons of Maple World!

10001020-NaColorSystem-null.name: The war chief of $map:02000051$ is gentle and wise, but fierce when he needs to be. These tones represent his warm heart, tinged with terrifying power.

10001021-NaColorSystem-null.name: A mix of orange and blue gives this dye a similar radiance to a seaside sunset.

10001022-NaColorSystem-null.name: It's so pink, it'll sear your eyeballs!

10001023-NaColorSystem-null.name: This startling shade of seaweed is a real splash with swimmers.

10001024-NaColorSystem-null.name: Under an ominous moon, you'll find agents of shadow draped in blue and purple.

10001025-NaColorSystem-null.name: The enchanted hands of Papulatus glow with this intense blue energy.

10001026-NaColorSystem-null.name: Mages love to dress themselves in luminous colors like this purple-red blend.

10001027-NaColorSystem-null.name: The distant, pink clouds in the sky are sometimes touched with this divine glow.

10001028-NaColorSystem-null.name: Not content with a basic brown hue, someone decided to brighten things up!

10001029-NaColorSystem-null.name: These evil tones were inspired by the ever-burning beast itself.

10001030-NaColorSystem-null.name: $npcName:11000068$ is a confounding mix of light and darkness, and so it this pattern.

10001031-NaColorSystem-null.name: This creamy tangerine dye will drive you BERSERK!

10001032-NaColorSystem-null.name: This inventive blend of colors is so tangy and bright you can almost taste it.

10001033-NaColorSystem-null.name: Those who delve deepest into the forest will find ones who glow with this self-same hues.

10001034-NaColorSystem-null.name: On clear nights, the infinite stars above can light the sky almost as bright as day.

10001035-NaColorSystem-null.name: Like it cold? Like it hot? Why not both?

10001036-NaColorSystem-null.name: There are many pinks in the world, but none that assault the eyes like this.

10001037-NaColorSystem-null.name: The healthiest blossoms bloom with yet unseen colors of nature.

10001038-NaColorSystem-null.name: This is what happens when you can't decide between serious and cute.

10001039-NaColorSystem-null.name: Who would have thought mixing white and purple would produce such splendor?

10001040-NaColorSystem-null.name: Here's a bold pink hue you can really sink your teeth into!

10001041-NaColorSystem-null.name: Captain $npcName:11000015$ forges her own path, so it's only fitting that she have her own color, too.

10001042-NaColorSystem-null.name: Remember your world and the wonders of nature when you see this color.

10001043-NaColorSystem-null.name: The thick forests of $map:02000023$ are alive with this verdant green.

10001044-NaColorSystem-null.name: This precious color can command the attentions of a whole room.

10001045-NaColorSystem-null.name: Let this bold blue guide you towards new adventures!

10001046-NaColorSystem-null.name: $npcName:11000502$ turned his hair this color from an unknown mix of dyes. Fashion designers took note and now everyone can share his wild side.

10001047-NaColorSystem-null.name: It's the color of $npcName:11003146$'s hair, but with a touch of the blues.

10001048-NaColorSystem-null.name: Bitter and dark with a hint of villainy.

10001049-NaColorSystem-null.name: Even that which is burned and crumbling can be the source of brilliant color.

10001050-NaColorSystem-null.name: If tenacity were a color, it would look a lot like this.

10001051-NaColorSystem-null.name: Sweet and spicy, like a ride in a musky taxi.

10001052-NaColorSystem-null.name: It's so green, you can't help but wonder if it's plastic.

10001053-NaColorSystem-null.name: Defenders of nature dress themselves in colors that reflect their charge.

10001054-NaColorSystem-null.name: This gentle blue is said to be inspired by the glow of the Green Lapenta.

10001055-NaColorSystem-null.name: When storm clouds gather, the ocean turns this rich hue.

10001056-NaColorSystem-null.name: This classic purple sits at the perfect point between bright and subdued.

10001057-NaColorSystem-null.name: A color that promises friendship, aspires to love and yet hints of jealousy.

10001058-NaColorSystem-null.name: $npcName:11000751$ favors this color for all her official functions.

10001059-NaColorSystem-null.name: This color is taken from the inky mushrooms around $map:02000100$.

10001060-NaColorSystem-null.name: Fires of this intense orange burn in the homelands of the evil Devilins.

10001061-NaColorSystem-null.name: Those who find gold are surely the luckiest of all!

10001062-NaColorSystem-null.name: The unforgettable color of a pile of mesos, glinting in the sunlight.

10001063-NaColorSystem-null.name: No one knows where $npcName:22000059$ hails from, but the mosses he carries with him are this incredible shade of green.

10001064-NaColorSystem-null.name: Just looking at this color is refreshing! Ahhh!

10001065-NaColorSystem-null.name: You can almost hear the pigment crackling with power.

10001066-NaColorSystem-null.name: This pink is so punchy you can't help but want to move your feet!

10001067-NaColorSystem-null.name: The natural color of the octopus is this lovely shade of pink. It's almost a shame they change colors so much!

10001068-NaColorSystem-null.name: Despite the warmth and beauty of this color, it was inspired by $npcName:11000144$'s long, bloody road leading to $map:02000044$.

10001069-NaColorSystem-null.name: What a lovely shade of SHAAAAAAAAAAAAARK!!

10001070-NaColorSystem-null.name: This brilliant red blazes with intensity. Can you handle the heat?

10001071-NaColorSystem-null.name: The empress's favorite fish is traditionally served in paper of this color.

10001072-NaColorSystem-null.name: It takes a little luck (and a lot of natural plant dyes) to get a yellow this yellow.

10001073-NaColorSystem-null.name: Little sprouts, when they first poke up from the soil, are the greenest plants in nature.

10001074-NaColorSystem-null.name: Among the most precious gems in the world are those that share this intense blue hue.

10001075-NaColorSystem-null.name: You'll have to dig deep to find the pigments that make this fine color.

10001076-NaColorSystem-null.name: This purple variety was inspired by $npcName:23000007$'s dark aura.

10001077-NaColorSystem-null.name: A perfect mix of berries and cream will produce this smooth, inviting color.

10001078-NaColorSystem-null.name: It took ages for royal stylists to achieve a color this intense, but the wait was worth it.

10001079-NaColorSystem-null.name: Be careful with this one in a blizzard. You're likely to disappear.

10001080-NaColorSystem-null.name: The enchanted mask of Parexus is painted with runes in this ominous color.

10001081-NaColorSystem-null.name: Inspired by the smooth, relaxing cafe beverage, this color is perfect for classy occasions.

10001082-NaColorSystem-null.name: This deep and queasy green will have you jumping out of your shoes.

10001083-NaColorSystem-null.name: Nothing says good eating like a freshly sheared broccoturtle. This dye, however, is sadly inedible.

10001084-NaColorSystem-null.name: This color often denotes luxury or elegance. It just so happens that $npcName:11003146$'s eyes are this color, too.

10001085-NaColorSystem-null.name: As you gaze at the gentle sky tonight, imagine being wrapped in that same infinite color. Then imagine no more!

10001086-NaColorSystem-null.name: The mighty Machodile actually has a mane that's this intense shade of purple. Hence the name.

10001087-NaColorSystem-null.name: You may not be able to handle this raw, unfiltered shade of grape.

10001088-NaColorSystem-null.name: At the Royal Court, this regal hue was all the rage a few seasons back.

10001089-NaColorSystem-null.name: Blacker than night, darker than the abyss. No light can escape this color.

10001090-NaColorSystem-null.name: This muted grey-white tone was designed to represent the blank slate of a new year.

10001091-NaColorSystem-null.name: This rich cream color is out of this world!

10001092-NaColorSystem-null.name: When the tide rolls out, you can find this cool color all along the shore.

10001093-NaColorSystem-null.name: According to an unnamed amorous admirer, this is the color of the fearsome Captain Moc when his scales glisten in the moonlight.

10001094-NaColorSystem-null.name: It is said that this particular shade of blue was one of the first discovered by ancient Maple fashionistas.

10001095-NaColorSystem-null.name: This lonely shade of blue is named after the long-suffering Vayar guardians who often go years without leaving their posts.

10001096-NaColorSystem-null.name: This color perfectly captures the majesty of the Shiny Hallowstone.

10001097-NaColorSystem-null.name: No color quite describes $map:02000124$ like this ashen gray.

10001098-NaColorSystem-null.name: Blacksmiths are as tough as iron and covered in soot, and now you can look like one too!

10001099-NaColorSystem-null.name: A modern person in a modern world deserves a modern look with a modern color.

10001100-NaColorSystem-null.name: Wolves? Mortal danger? Pink ram don't care.

10001101-NaColorSystem-null.name: A dye the color of the wolf statue on $map:02000051$'s spire. Do you hear howling...?

10001102-NaColorSystem-null.name: This is the green of nature's greatest warrior: the snail.

10001103-NaColorSystem-null.name: In your time of need, you can always depend on your friends from the forest to help you.

10001104-NaColorSystem-null.name: The color of the sky from $npcName:21000025$ and $npcName:21000023$'s childhood. They're inseparable even to this day.

10001105-NaColorSystem-null.name: A blind friend is left to his grief.

10001106-NaColorSystem-null.name: The seahorse's wings flashed brilliant violet as it swam through the sea...

10001107-NaColorSystem-null.name: A lovely shade that was tainted by the jealousy of two sisters.

10001108-NaColorSystem-null.name: The color of a love so true, it transcends all screens, both big and small.

10001109-NaColorSystem-null.name: After years of toil, the veteran miner's fur took on a golden tint.

10001110-NaColorSystem-null.name: You went fishing in lava and you came back with a full catch.

10001111-NaColorSystem-null.name: This dye pulses with undying power.

10001112-NaColorSystem-null.name: Who can understand the soul of an artist?

10001113-NaColorSystem-null.name: The magical fountain of the gardens plays beautiful music. Now you can take that music wherever you go with this enchanting dye!

10001114-NaColorSystem-null.name: Only the bravest pig would try to fly.

10001115-NaColorSystem-null.name: The scales of the golden fish are more brilliant than the rarest precious metals.

10001116-NaColorSystem-null.name: Turtles, with their long lifespans, know the most interesting stories.

10001117-NaColorSystem-null.name: The unmistakable mauve of a shark expert.

10001118-NaColorSystem-null.name: Every precious pearl is born inside a world of color.

10001119-NaColorSystem-null.name: As the koi dances through the water, the flashing color of its scales are mesmerizing.

10001120-NaColorSystem-null.name: The sheen of $npcName:11003287$'s fur is almost impressive as his evil intellect. Now that sheen can be yours!

10001121-NaColorSystem-null.name: A hue to remember misunderstandings and poor communication by.

10001122-NaColorSystem-null.name: After the lumarigons left the world, a dark shadow passed over their holy land of Nazkar.

10001123-NaColorSystem-null.name: $npcName:11003053$'s motives are shrouded in mystery, and his fate is uncertain. Perhaps this deep blue was the source of his power.

10001124-NaColorSystem-null.name: Sometimes you're trapped in a crystal ball. And sometimes you're decked out in a lovely shade of mauve.

10001125-NaColorSystem-null.name: Deep within this divine sanctuary, the Rune Shamans hid a magic weapon of untold power, the Runicta. $npc:23000078$ sits beside it in an enchanted sleep, awaiting a disciple of the runic arts capable of wielding the weapon's incredible power.

10001126-NaColorSystem-null.name: Far from the more developed western side of the island, $map:02010063$ still celebrates Karkar's older traditions, such as the creation of this lilac dye.

10001127-NaColorSystem-null.name: Dye from a monster made of dark purple mucus. Even though it lives in cold regions, it is irresistibly attracted to fire.

10001128-NaColorSystem-null.name: $npcName:24002004$ studied under $npcName:24002005$ for many years. When $npcName:24002005$ decided to begin his long slumber, $npcName:24002004$ decided to remain by his master's side.

10001129-NaColorSystem-null.name: The large pyramid stands as a symbol of the collapsed Merjit kingdom. On the surface it looks like any other ruins, but beware! Adventurers who enter become enthralled by the illusions spun by the dead swarming within.

10001130-NaColorSystem-null.name: $npcName:11004265$ was once a genius programmer. He opened the $map:02010058$ to follow his dream of becoming a DJ.

10001131-NaColorSystem-null.name: $npc:24001308$ was once an ordinary beast living on Victoria Island until it was one day magically whisked to the desert. It wandered day and night until it found its way to a place called $map:02000338$. Since the cave was nice and cool, it stayed there.

10001132-NaColorSystem-null.name: Shoppers exiting the mall faced an unpleasant surprise when their bags were snatched by the game console monsters in $map:02010010$! No one knows what they're planning to use them for.

10001133-NaColorSystem-null.name: The circuit may not be open yet, but racing's newest spokeswoman is ready to begin.

10001134-NaColorSystem-null.name: Even when it's as sick as a dog, a meerkat is adorable. Just like this dye!

10001135-NaColorSystem-null.name: This hue recalls the great beast who took control of the oasis of $map:02010084$.

10001136-NaColorSystem-null.name: A fresh lavender scent blows from the island.

10001137-NaColorSystem-null.name: Freedom was almost in reach for two hapless convicts.

10001138-NaColorSystem-null.name: This color evokes a legend of Karkar Island. Is the creature who wears this shade a descendant of the dragons? An ancient god? Or something... more?

10001139-NaColorSystem-null.name: The lights that shine at night on the Auto Bridge are quite romantic.

10001140-NaColorSystem-null.name: This sleepy green is a hit in the world of Boroboro fashion.

10001141-NaColorSystem-null.name: Doondun may be a sewage-eating monster, but there's something inspired about that sickly green hue.

10001142-NaColorSystem-null.name: This bronze hue is larger than life.

10001143-NaColorSystem-null.name: This moody red hue was inspired by $npcName:22409134$'s terrible mask.

10001144-NaColorSystem-null.name: This bittersweet hue is the shade of the muddied waters of $npcName:11000285$'s spring.

10001145-NaColorSystem-null.name: Like a faded memory, this hue is a solemn reminder of what was.

10001146-NaColorSystem-null.name: The pink-tinged hue of a new butterfly's wings.

10001147-NaColorSystem-null.name: You can indulge in this sweet hue all day without ever gaining an ounce.

10001148-NaColorSystem-null.name: This creamy color was inspired by a Stone Crabby glinting in the sun.

10001149-NaColorSystem-null.name: Make a bold fashion statement with this dye the color of sickly frog emissions!

10001150-NaColorSystem-null.name: This enchanting hue is a hit among witches.

10001151-NaColorSystem-null.name: Gazing upon this brilliant hue, you can't help but feel as though time is standing still.

10001152-NaColorSystem-null.name: Unrequited love. Ah, is there anything so tragic?

10001153-NaColorSystem-null.name: A hearty hue for love-lovers everywhere.

10001154-NaColorSystem-null.name: This tired rose hue is emblematic of a love gone cold.

10001155-NaColorSystem-null.name: This color evokes the image of a cactus dancing in the sun-scorched desert.

10001156-NaColorSystem-null.name: Like a caterpillar dreaming of becoming a beautiful butterfly, this warm hue brings to mind the promise of a new day.

10001157-NaColorSystem-null.name: Like an unfulfilled love burning through the ages, this smoldering hue gradually shifts from warm to cool.

10001158-NaColorSystem-null.name: A color so sweet, even the empress couldn't resist it.

10001159-NaColorSystem-null.name: Like an honorable soul tinged with blood by battle, this hue is emblematic of the souls of Perion's warriors.

10001160-NaColorSystem-null.name: The color of a red rune, which shines beautifully.

10001161-NaColorSystem-null.name: $map:02010002$, the jewel of the desert! Sure, the taxes are higher here, but the glitz and glamor are surely worth it.

10001162-NaColorSystem-null.name: The starflower that blooms in the desert shines like the stars in the sky. This dye was made from such flowers.

10001163-NaColorSystem-null.name: A cool breeze, icy water, and fun rides! Visit $map:02010019$ today!

10001164-NaColorSystem-null.name: A color resembling the sands of $map:02010023$. A passing sandstorm revealed ancient ruins, piquing the curiosity of explorers everywhere.

10001165-NaColorSystem-null.name: The Auto Bridge linking eastern and western Karkar offers a breathtaking view of the ocean.

10001166-NaColorSystem-null.name: Lots of memories are nice, but the memories of all the gold you discovered in $map:02010022$? Those are golden.

10001167-NaColorSystem-null.name: $map:80000012$ is as mysterious as it is full of cats.

10001168-NaColorSystem-null.name: Much like the great dragons, this dye is pure fire.

10001169-NaColorSystem-null.name: A great treasure is said to be buried in the $map:80000013$. What treasures will you find beneath the sand?

10001170-NaColorSystem-null.name: This dye sends a clear message: keep your distance.

10001171-NaColorSystem-null.name: Though this dye was made from carapace, it shines like gold.

10001172-NaColorSystem-null.name: The perfect color for your coat as you explore a new land.

10001173-NaColorSystem-null.name: Once, there was a pig who that that love could conquer all...

10001174-NaColorSystem-null.name: This abyssal blue is the last thing the sailors of the Sea Siren saw.

10001175-NaColorSystem-null.name: The vile shaman spread his wings, casting a shadow across the land. This is the color of that shadow.

10001176-NaColorSystem-null.name: This dye is awarded to master Runeblades by Terrun Calibre, the great school of spell and swordsmanship.

10001177-NaColorSystem-null.name: If you see this color, best to look the other way.

10001178-NaColorSystem-null.name: The burgundia is a hearty desert plant, prized for the distinct red dye that can be made from its sap.

10001179-NaColorSystem-null.name: Even bugs need to get away from it all now and then.

10001180-NaColorSystem-null.name: They are in tune with nature, cultivating their body and mind to become one with the natural world. They believe the mysterious power of light can be drawn out.

10001181-NaColorSystem-null.name: A color resembling the blue soul of the Soul Binder, which burns bright.

10001182-NaColorSystem-null.name: A crimson purple that's at once cold and beautiful.

10001183-NaColorSystem-null.name: $npcName:23000094$, the secret weapon of the Resistance, has left $npcName:11000401$ rather perturbed over its capabilities. Some say he's turned this particular shade of green...

10001184-NaColorSystem-null.name: The Maple Alliance's flagship, the Sky Fortress was originally intended to be a mobile Dark Wind command center. You can wear its color proudly with this dye!

10001185-NaColorSystem-null.name: After all these years, the Lumiknights have stepped into the light... wearing this dazzling shade of blue.

10001186-NaColorSystem-null.name: Back in my day, we knew a thing or two about orange dye...

10001187-NaColorSystem-null.name: This red is up to code in the Maple Alliance Uniform Handbook.

10001188-NaColorSystem-null.name: Dark Wind is the shadow that evil fears. The purple shadow.

10001189-NaColorSystem-null.name: Just like a Green Hoods briefing, this green is orderly, organized, and occasionally redundant.

10001190-NaColorSystem-null.name: Dye stained red by the fallen Balrog scourge.

10001191-NaColorSystem-null.name: This color represents the ruin that $npcName:11003795$ and the $npcNamePlural:11003781$ plan to inflict upon the world.

10001192-NaColorSystem-null.name: A regal color to celebrate the hero who helped blast Infernog into outer space.

10001193-NaColorSystem-null.name: A special red for the soldier who puts in good work every week.

10001194-NaColorSystem-null.name: Congratulations on earning rank A in Fortress Rumble!

10001195-NaColorSystem-null.name: You have faced the High Templar in sight of the Oracle. For your efforts, you have learned the true nature of... sky blue.

10001196-NaColorSystem-null.name: Vanguards train by beating each other into the dirt. This bronze shows that you have a place among them.

10001197-NaColorSystem-null.name: You have proven your loyalty and competence on the field of battle. But most of all, this dye proves that you have earned your captain's trust.

10001198-NaColorSystem-null.name: Kill or be killed. This is the rule of the Shadow Walkers. By wearing this color, you tell the world that you are a survivor.

10001199-NaColorSystem-null.name: The Green Hoods may live in the forest, but that doesn't mean that they don't know a thing or two about technology.

10001200-NaColorSystem-null.name: This is the color of the passion that burns through your veins.

10001201-NaColorSystem-null.name: Only a fool picks a fight with the Gray Wolf.

10001202-NaColorSystem-null.name: A dye for the heroes who dove into the Storm's Eye to save the Runeblades... and the world.

10001203-NaColorSystem-null.name: $npcName:11003845$ bent the power of time to his will with the Red Lapenta. You may not have a lapenta, but at least you have this snazzy violet dye!

10001204-NaColorSystem-null.name: Space itself twisted at $npcName:11003886$'s whim. Fashion will twist before you when you wear this mauve dye.

10001205-NaColorSystem-null.name: Under the lapenta's influence, $npcName:11003885$ drank the life force of others like a fine wine. The only wine you're interested in is this wine-colored dye!

10001206-NaColorSystem-null.name: Close your eyes and open your ears to the words of the Guardian of the Seas.

10001207-NaColorSystem-null.name: Somewhere in the mountains, obscured by an unending blizzard, there is the hidden road that leads to a lost kingdom...

10001208-NaColorSystem-null.name: You joined the final battle against $npcName:11001698$ and the corrupted lumarigon, $npcName:23000063$.

10001209-NaColorSystem-null.name: The mermaid sisters of the coral island sing a song tinged with sadness...

10001210-NaColorSystem-null.name: Queen $npcName:11004014$ watches over Icethorn Ridge. Her frosty sorrow is stinging and bitter.

10001211-NaColorSystem-null.name: The only child of a noble family, $npcName:11001698$'s life was cut short by a freak accident. The Black Mage raised her from the grave and placed her at his side, naming her the Commander of Rage.

10001212-NaColorSystem-null.name: A new power surges through your body.

10001213-NaColorSystem-null.name: Lapenshards are small, but they resonate with great power. And so it is with this eye-catching lavender dye.

10001214-NaColorSystem-null.name: The official color of the Dread Pirate $npcName:21420107$! He's as fearsome as he is shabby.

10001215-NaColorSystem-null.name: Through thick and thin, the Snow Queen is completely devoted to $npcName:11004024$.

10001216-NaColorSystem-null.name: A rich amber for the hero who continues to grow stronger in the face of overwhelming odds.

10001217-NaColorSystem-null.name: You just can't stop evolving your pets!

10001218-NaColorSystem-null.name: A refreshing dye for a fresh adventure! What will you accomplish with the Frontier Foundation?

10001219-NaColorSystem-null.name: This pale pink will have you dancing to $npcName:23000088$'s beat.
